name: WebDAM Solutions
overview:
WebDAM is a completely web-based and hosted digital asset management, hosted image management solution designed to save your organization time and money. With WebDAM, you have access to a host of web tools to centralize, manage, and distribute image files throughout your organization. WebDAM is robust, easy to implement, and affordable for organizations of all sizes.

Centralized Database: Your digital assets will no longer be scattered throughout your organization on hard drives and disks. With WebDAMtm, you have a central, secure website to upload your images and other digital assets quickly and efficiently. Our rock-solid IT infrastructure means 24/7 accessibility for your images throughout your organization

Online Sharing and Distribution Tools: Easily share your images with colleagues, clients, and partners using our distribution features including lightboxes, high-resolution image download tools, and email features. Our online reporting tools provide quick access to the latest download reports to you will always know who has downloaded your images. Our proprietary access control technology provides unmatched flexibility in controlling who can access your images and who cannot.

Lightening Fast Search: Search millions of images in lightning-fast speeds with our cutting-edge image search technology which includes captioning your images using IPTC meta-data. Tag your images with custom fields specific to your organization such as department, division, or internal tracking number.

Your Brand Identity: Your brand is critical to your business. That’s why WebDAMtm has the built-in flexibility to extend your corporate brand throughout your online gallery. Our designers will assist you in every step of the process to ensure a professional, seamless look-and-feel for your online database.

E-Commerce Add On Module: The e-commerce module can be added to your WebDAMtm package for an integrated e-commerce shopping cart right from your online database. You decide which images are available for sale, set your own pricing, select which products you would like to sell (including digital files) and even choose how your orders are fulfilled.
